PPLoc: http://www.acturus.com/privacy-policy and intraturus (acturus Intranet - employee access only)
activities: Acturus is a global research-based consulting agency with integrated qualitative and quantitative capabilities that brings clarity to business and brand decision-making. Acturus collects personal data from and about individuals (respondents) for use generally in connection with the operation of its business.  Such personal data may be used by acturus to provide market research services to its clients.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: BBB EU Safe Harbor Program: Acturus has contracted with Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc. as our 3rd party dispute resolution service to handle all complaints related to violations of our Safe Harbor Policy.  The contract is dated 2/28/08 and is renewed annually.
